channel.title: Computer started freezing recently
channel.description:
Happens every other day, usually have to hold power button to restart
No viruses either. I have no clues to what is causing this
Would a system restore repair it if its windows?
Just checking my restore logs it says June 6th windows "critical" update. And that may have been around the time the freezing started
wat do

item.title: Computer started freezing recently
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:524483”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=643034.msg4329711#msg4329711 date=1373478890]
does sound like a driver issue then did you update your graphics driver recently?
[/quote]
that was around the same time, I have a gtx 560ti and updated to the latest[/quote]figured so

either make it so it doesn’t start up (do msconfig in run and go from there ) or just roll back the driver

Read full topic

item.title: Computer started freezing recently
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Loveandpower:

does sound like a driver issue then did you update your graphics driver recently?

that was around the same time, I have a gtx 560ti and updated to the latest

Read full topic

item.title: Computer started freezing recently
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:524483”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=643034.msg4329591#msg4329591 date=1373467584]
You could try restoring before that time?
[/quote]
The last restore date is the date of the update, not sure if before or after[/quote]
It will have been before, Windows always automatically creates a restore point before any significant updates, just in case it does happen to mess up.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer started freezing recently
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

does sound like a driver issue then did you update your graphics driver recently?

Read full topic

item.title: Computer started freezing recently
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Soulcist:

You could try restoring before that time?

The last restore date is the date of the update, not sure if before or after

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:3, topic:524483”]Either that or a dodgy driver update/install.

Does it just freeze, no blue screen or anything?[/quote]
No it just freezes the cursor first and then everything else freezes

Read full topic

item.title: Computer started freezing recently
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:3, topic:524483”]Either that or a dodgy driver update/install.

Does it just freeze, no blue screen or anything?[/quote]was gonna ask about the blue screen of death as well

does it freeze at startup?

I remember I had worked on an optiplex 580 once where once I had updated the AMD driver it had started to freeze on startup. I disabled the item from starting on startup and it worked perfectly.

Read full topic

I’d try restoring it first then let us know what happens.
